lavaTileDesc: Destroys anything that lands on it.
dragonDesc: Can move, harvest ingredients, and launch desserts.
tankDesc: Moves 1 tile per turn. Their shield blocks all projectiles except Sticky Pudding.
assassinDesc: Moves 2 tiles per turn. Vaults over lava and half walls.
redIngredientDesc: Stuns enemy when thrown. Can craft into a dessert.
blueIngredientDesc: Stuns enemy when thrown. Can craft into a dessert.
greenIngredientDesc: Stuns enemy when thrown. Can craft into a dessert.
killDessertDesc: Explodes on a stunned enemy, destroying it and adjacent enemies. Otherwise, stuns.
pullDessertDesc: Pulls ingredient tiles, enemies, and dragons in front of thrower. Stuns any pulled enemy.
pushDessertDesc: Knocks enemy back and stuns them. If 2 enemies collide, both are killed.
